DOC.detailed_description: The trial single center randomize , 3-arm , control , within-subject crossover study utilize multiple sampling , repeat measure paradigm . The trial test 3 treatment condition 30 relatively healthy men woman 25-60 year age . Study treatment include Control ( without avocado ) , Test Meal 1 ( 1/2 avocado ; ~68g ) , Test Meal 2 ( 1 Avocado ; ~136g ) . Subjects require meet several inclusion exclusion criterion , assess online clinic mechanism , include questionnaire , blood analysis anthropometric measure . Eligible subject invite participate study . Each subject ask come one Information Session/Screening Visit , one Pre-Study Visit , three dinner pick-ups ( day test day visit ) three Test Day Visits . Subjects randomize receive test treatment base randomization schedule Pre-Study Visit . During Pre-Study Visit subject instruct process complete study questionnaire counsel restrict avocado intake intake colored plant food rich phytonutrients 3 day prior Test Day Visit . They ask restrict alcohol intake , coffee/tea/ caffeinated beverage intake moderate / vigorous physical activity drink plenty water maintain hydration 24 h prior Test Day Visit . They instruct come CNRC day Test Day Visit pick dinner meal even snack . Subjects ask get least 7 hour sleep come CNRC overnight fast 10 h Test Day Visit . Each Test Day Visit require subject clinic ~7 h complete baseline post challenge meal test procedure . Subjects evaluate compliance protocol ( diet , exercise , sleep , fast ) , body weight blood pressure measure baseline flow mediate dilation ( FMD ) recode placement catheter baseline blood sample take . Baseline subjective satiety measure visual analogue scale ( VAS ) consume one 3 breakfast treatment meal . FMD measure 2 time point breakfast blood sample VAS questionnaire collect multiple time point 6 h postprandial period .
